summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 16, Boren's Addition, being the alley between 4th Avenue and 5th Avenue, from Spring Street to Seneca Street; by paving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7606 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
